description: The report, which fell short of a full U.N. investigation, said rape likely occurred at at least three sites on Oct. 7. Some hostages held in Gaza were also subject to sexual violence, the team found.
title: A U.N. report finds 'reasonable grounds to believe' attacks in Israel included rapes

description: Tricia Romano's The Freaks Came Out To Write chronicles the passion and talent that made a great American newspaper — and the forces that killed it.
title: This oral history of the 'Village Voice' captures its creativity and rebelliousness

description: Ithaca, N.Y., wants to eliminate greenhouse gasses by 2030 — 20 years faster than the rest of the country. But even in this liberal city meeting climate targets is harder than expected.
title: Getting off fossil fuels is hard, but this city is doing it — building by building

description: Haiti's government declared a state of emergency and curfew Sunday in a bid to regain control after violence over the weekend saw armed gang members storm the country's two biggest prisons.
title: Haiti declares a curfew as it tries to restore order after weekend jailbreak
